relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 又使她們下體, 樞紐
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 又使她们下体, 枢纽

vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) transgression, rebellion
1a1) transgression (against individuals)
1a2) transgression (nation against nation)
1a3) transgression (against God)
1a3a) in general
1a3b) as recognised by sinner
1a3c) as God deals with it
1a3d) as God forgives
1a4) guilt of transgression
1a5) punishment for transgression
1a6) offering for transgression
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:

1a1) 罪過 (對個人)
1a2) 罪過 (國家對國家)
1a3) 罪過 (對神)
1a3a) 一般
1a3b) 罪人所承認的
1a3c) 神處理的
1a3d) 神原諒的
1a4) 犯罪的罪疚感
1a5) 對於犯罪的處罰
1a6) 為過犯的獻祭
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 罪过
1a1) 罪过 (对个人)
1a2) 罪过 (国家对国家)

1a3a) 一般
1a3b) 罪人所承认的

1a3d) 神原谅的
